educations.schoolName: Temple University - James E. Beasley School of Law

positions.companyName: Margaret W. Wong & Associates Co., LPA
positions.description:
-	Provide initial consultations to prospective clients
-	Appear and represent clients before the Immigration Court in connection with removal, deportation, and bond proceedings
-	Work with criminal attorneys to advise on how client's criminal matter affect their immigration status
-	Prepare and file motions to reopen and motions to reconsider
-	Prepare and file appeals with the Board of Immigration Appeals and Administrative Appeals Office
-	Prepare and file family based immigration petitions, TPS, NACARA, asylum, adjustment of status, naturalization, derivative citizenship, VAWA, U Visa, and consular processing cases
-	Prepare and file waivers of inadmissibility applications and briefs
-	Appear and represent clients before the Immigration Service for their interviews
-	Supervise and oversee the work of paralegals and legal assistants
positions.title: Immigration Attorney

positions.description:
-	Provide initial consultations to prospective clients
-	Appear and represent clients before the Immigration Court in connection with removal, deportation, and bond proceedings
-	Work with criminal attorneys to advise on how client's criminal matter affect their immigration status
-	Prepare and file motions to reopen and motions to reconsider

-	Prepare and file waivers of inadmissibility applications and briefs
-       Prepare and file H-1B, TN, L, and E visa petitions
-	Appear and represent clients before the Immigration Service for their interviews
-	Supervise and oversee the work of paralegals and legal assistants
positions.location: Las Vegas, Nevada and Salt Lake City, UT
positions.title: Associate Attorney

positions.description: Handled family immigration and removal/deportation defense
